desc: It's a passion started by chance, creating a brand reflecting our lifestyle! Boho Fashion w/a Western Flare along w/trendy, affordable accessories. Now offering American Hats! We also offer unique home decor including pictures, cowhides, & more!

layout.text: It's a passion started by chance, creating a brand reflecting our lifestyle! Boho Hippie w/a Western Flare Boutique offering a variety of apparel along w/hand-crafted jewelry, hand bags, and accessories!
